nodes.caption: Instrumental variables Plasma fatty acid-associated SNPs
Assumption 2: genetic variants should not be associated with potential confounders
Outcomes Primary outcome Type 2 diabetes Secondary outcomes Fasting glucose Fasting insulin HOMA-B HOMA-IR
Assumption 1: genetic variants should be robustly associated with the exposure
Assumption 3: genetic variants should affect the outcome only through the risk factor, not via alternative pathways
